titles.title: Solar Farm Fairness Act
A bill to amend the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to clarify certain requirements relating to solar electric power generation projects.
Solar Farm Fairness Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Solar Farm Fairness Act
This bill amends the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to revise requirements under the Rural Energy for America Program concerning financing solar electric power generation projects.
